001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ExtendedBolusStatusRequest;
009
010/**
011 * Returns information on the current extended bolus.
012 */
013/**
014 * Returns information on the current extended bolus.
015 *
016
017 *
018 * <br>
019 *
020 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ExtendedBolusStatusRequest}, opCode 47, size 18
021 *
022 * <br>
023 *
024 * 
025 * <table border='1'>
026 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>47</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>18</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
029 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
030 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ExtendedBolusStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
031 * </table>
032 */@MessageProps(
033    opCode=47,
034    size=18,
035    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
036    request=ExtendedBolusStatusRequest.class
037)
038public class ExtendedBolusStatusResponse extends Message {
039    
040    private int bolusStatus;
041    private int bolusId;
042    private long timestamp;
043    private long requestedVolume;
044    private long duration;
045    private int bolusSource;
046    
047    public ExtendedBolusStatusResponse() {}
048    
049    public ExtendedBolusStatusResponse(int bolusStatus, int bolusId, long timestamp, long requestedVolume, long duration, int bolusSource) {
050        this.cargo = buildCargo(bolusStatus, bolusId, timestamp, requestedVolume, duration, bolusSource);
051        this.bolusStatus = bolusStatus;
052        this.bolusId = bolusId;
053        this.timestamp = timestamp;
054        this.requestedVolume = requestedVolume;
055        this.duration = duration;
056        this.bolusSource = bolusSource;
057        
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * <table border="1">
062     * <caption>Parsed fields for ExtendedBolusStatusResponse:</caption>
063     * <tr><td><code>bolusStatus</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
064     * <tr><td><code>bolusId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 1)</code></td></tr>
065     * <tr><td><code>timestamp</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 5)</code></td></tr>
066     * <tr><td><code>requestedVolume</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 9)</code></td></tr>
067     * <tr><td><code>duration</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 13)</code></td></tr>
068     * <tr><td><code>bolusSource</code></td><td><code>raw[17]</code></td></tr>
069     * </table>
070     */
071    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
072        Preconditions.checkArgument(raw.length == props().size());
073        this.cargo = raw;
074        this.bolusStatus = raw[0];
075        this.bolusId = Bytes.readShort(raw, 1);
076        this.timestamp = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 5);
077        this.requestedVolume = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 9);
078        this.duration = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 13);
079        this.bolusSource = raw[17];
080        
081    }
082
083    
084    /**
085     * <table border="1">
086     * <caption>Byte layout for ExtendedBolusStatusResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
087     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
088     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) bolusStatus</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(timestamp) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(timestamp) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(timestamp) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(timestamp) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(requestedVolume) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>toUint32(requestedVolume) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
097     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>toUint32(requestedVolume) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
098     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>toUint32(requestedVolume) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
099     * <tr><td>11</td><td><code>toUint32(duration) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
100     * <tr><td>12</td><td><code>toUint32(duration) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
101     * <tr><td>13</td><td><code>toUint32(duration) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
102     * <tr><td>14</td><td><code>toUint32(duration) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
103     * <tr><td>15</td><td><code>(byte) bolusSource</code></td></tr>
104     * <tr><td>16</td><td><code>new byte[]{0} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
105     * <tr><td>17</td><td><code>new byte[]{0} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
106     * </table>
107     */
108    public static byte[] buildCargo(int bolusStatus, int bolusId, long timestamp, long requestedVolume, long duration, int bolusSource) {
109        return Bytes.combine(
110            new byte[]{ (byte) bolusStatus }, 
111            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId), 
112            Bytes.toUint32(timestamp), 
113            Bytes.toUint32(requestedVolume), 
114            Bytes.toUint32(duration), 
115            new byte[]{ (byte) bolusSource },
116            new byte[]{ 0, 0});
117    }
118    
119    public int getBolusStatus() {
120        return bolusStatus;
121    }
122    public int getBolusId() {
123        return bolusId;
124    }
125    public long getTimestamp() {
126        return timestamp;
127    }
128    public long getRequestedVolume() {
129        return requestedVolume;
130    }
131    public long getDuration() {
132        return duration;
133    }
134    public int getBolusSource() {
135        return bolusSource;
136    }
137    
138}
